publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7115 David Stewart: Victim Support Scotland, International Conference—That the Parliament notes Victim Support Scotland’s first international conference, to be held between 5 and 7 October 2010 in Edinburgh; commends Victim Support Scotland for bringing together practitioners, academics, statutory bodies and researchers to discuss victimology and reflect on victim engagement in the justice system; further notes that 2010 marks the 25th anniversary of Victim Support Scotland; considers that all individuals and agencies that provide services to victims of crime undertake vital work, and encourages the Scottish Executive to support Victim Support Scotland’s call to establish a victims’ commissioner for Scotland. Supported by: Marlyn Glen*, Michael McMahon*, Peter Peacock*, Rhoda Grant*, Mike Pringle*, Rhona Brankin*, Bill Butler*, John Park*, Mary Mulligan*, Robin Harper*
S3M-7115 Victim Support Scotland, International Conference (lodged on 28 September 2010) Jackie Baillie*, James Kelly*, Cathy Peattie*, Elaine Smith*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Hugh Henry*, Sarah Boyack*
S3M-7115 Victim Support Scotland, International Conference (lodged on 28 September 2010) Mr Frank McAveety*
